run_sweep[source]

run_sweep(sweep:"Path to YAML file with the sweep config"=None, program:"Path to Python training script"=None, launch:"Launch wanbd agent."=True, count:"Number of runs to execute"=None, entity:"username or team name where you're sending runs"=None, project:"The name of the project where you're sending the new run."=None, sweep_id:"Sweep ID. This option omits sweep"=None, relogin:"Relogin to wandb."=False, login_key:"Login key for wandb"=None)
